Row.Text: Nicolas de Neufville, seigneur de Villeroy
Maximilien de Béthune, Duke of Sully
René Nicolas Charles Augustin de Maupeou
Archbishop Étienne Charles de Loménie de Brienne
Louis Auguste Le Tonnelier de Breteuil
Élie Decazes, duc de Glücksbierg and Decazes

What a fabulous evening to hold a ball! All our good friends and dear relatives shall be in attendance, as well as the finest and richest people that France has to offer. And we shall have them all wear silly things, so that they don't look as good as I. Not that they could! Hoh-hoh![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be France [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be in a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least two Chateaus [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 {1_ResourceDesc} [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for {3_Num} Turns [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with the number of Chateaus in the empire [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: The number of 'WLTKD' turns increases with the number of Chateaus in the empire

What a fabulous evening to hold a ball! All our good friends and dear relatives shall be in attendance, as well as the finest and richest people that France has to offer. And we shall have them all wear silly things, so that they don't look as good as I. Not that they could! Hoh-hoh![NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for a number of turns
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} is holding a fabulous Masquerade Ball at his palace. We were not invited, however.

Jean-Baptiste Colbert, our Minister of Finances, has proposed that we adopt mercantilism as our prime economic policy. Privileging the interests of the state over the interests of merchants and traders, he argues, shall propel France's economy forward by centuries.[NEWLINE]
We shall adopt the principles of mercantilism at once.
We must do no wrong by our merchants and traders.
We have adopted the principles of Mercantilism.
We have adopted the principles of Mercantilism.

The esteemed Marshal Vauban has innovated a means to improving the defense of France's borders. All it would require is a little bit of grease - and by this, we mean, of course, a heap of coin.[NEWLINE]
The gold this would cost would be better spent on a new gown!
Very well. Put these plans into action straight away.
We have refused to pay for Vauban's ludicrous plans.
We have paid for Vauban's plans to fortify the French borders.
